item.title: Telegraf & Prometheus Swiss Army Knife for Metrics
item.description: There are a lot of different solutions when it comes to collecting metrics, I found myself happy with this hybrid solution. Telegraf is an agent written in Go for collecting metrics from the system it’s running on. It’s developed by Influxdata the people behind InfluxDB, but Telegraf has a lot of outputs plugins and can be used without InfluxDB. Many different platform (FreeBSD, Linux, x86, Arm …) are offered and only one single static binary (Thanks to Golang) is needed to deploy an agent.
